plays.text: Penalty to Dick Tarnstrom 2 minutes for Tripping J.P. Dumont

Goal scored by Zigmund Palffy assisted by Sergei Gonchar AND Mark Recchi

Goal scored by Mark Recchi assisted by Sidney Crosby AND Zigmund Palffy

Penalty to Ales Kotalik 2 minutes for Interference(opposing player not identified)

Goal scored by Jochen Hecht assisted by Tim Connolly AND Toni Lydman
